item.description:
Generation Desi & friends along with the team that brought you Caprice Fridays proudly present Spring Fling 2013 at MANTRA BOSTON

It has been a long long winter and we are excited to have the Spring Finally here.

Let's celebrate on "April 20th"w/Desi Spring Fling..a Bollywood/Bhangra/ Desi Party at MANTRA BOSTON

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Make sure to have your dancing shoes onn and Rock the night away. Party with BU, NU, Tufts, Harvard, MIT, Berklee, Simmons and many more.

Multiple Dj's will be playing Bollywood/ Bhangra/ Remixes/ Top 40 & Desi Mashups & Today's Top Hip Hop mixes

Also on the Mic will be will Miss India New England Runners up Monica Gill.

Ladies free before 10:30 PM with RSVP. Gentlemen $5 on the Guest list until 10:30 PM

Get there early. You don't want to miss out on a fun party.

For RSVP email: Generationdesi@gmail.com

Doors at 9 PM sharp. Dress to Impress.

Questions call Ravi 617-416-8705 or Jeet 617-216-1492 or email: Generationdesi@gmail.com

RSVP for reduced Guestlist or Admission: Generationdesi@gmail.com

Get there early. This is a party you don't want to miss

Info www.Generationdesi.com
item.name: "We Love Boston" Bollywood/Bhangra - Desi party @ Mantra
